3D dense face model.from sentence: poses , we propose to fit the 3D dense face model rather than the sparse landmark shape model to the image .

call.from sentence: We call this method 3D Dense Face Alignment ( 3DDFA ) .

fitting process.propose: cascaded convolutional neutral network ( CNN ) based regression method
fitting process.from sentence: To resolve the fitting process in 3 DDFA , we propose a cascaded convolutional neutral network ( CNN ) based regression method .

specifically designed feature.from sentence: In this work , we adopt CNN to fit the 3D face model with a specifically designed feature , namely Projected Normalized Coordinate Code ( PNCC ) .

Weighted Parameter Distance Cost ( WPDC.from sentence: Besides , Weighted Parameter Distance Cost ( WPDC ) is proposed as the cost function .

3D face alignment.from sentence: To the best of our knowledge , this is the first attempt to solve the 3D face alignment with CNN .

performance.of: prior and our proposed face alignment algorithms

synthesized samples.from sentence: The synthesized samples well simulate the face appearances in large poses and boost the performance of both prior and our proposed face alignment algorithms .

training.from sentence: To enable the training of the 3DDFA , we construct a face database containing pairs of 2D face images and 3D face models .

60 k + training samples.from sentence: We further propose a face profiling algorithm to synthesize 60 k + training samples across large poses .
